channel.title: default audio volume
channel.description:
During development of https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Orca I noticed that default volume is zero or almost zero. Therefore [Initial Setup of Orca](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Orca#Initial_Setup_of_Orca) in Whonix will set the volume to 50%.
Otherwise a super low or off volume setting might be a general usability issue.
What would be a good default volume? 25%? 50%? 75%? 100%? How do other operating systems handle this?

item.title: default audio volume
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
During development of https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Orca I noticed that default volume is zero or almost zero. Therefore Initial Setup of Orca in Whonix will set the volume to 50%.

Otherwise a super low or off volume setting might be a general usability issue.

What would be a good default volume? 25%? 50%? 75%? 100%? How do other operating systems handle this?
